entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:02 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening. 60 percent chance of ice pellets or freezing rain overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain late in the morning then to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
